page.title: 02The local newspaper,Stoke
page.content: The Sentinel is our local newspaper.The main offices are in Hanley.A Sentinel reporter came to our school to talk about his work.He brought photographs of famous people who had visited our area.He also showed us a negative of tomorrow's paper! In the Sentinel Thursday July 11th 1985 the headline was,No!Stoke's Asda lifeline gets the boot.The article is about plans for an Asda superstore to be built at the local football ground. The store would have provided many jobs and helped Stoke City's money problems. City councillors rejected the plans. Just before the meeting members of the Stoke Supporters Club gave in a petition of 33,000 names to the town hall. Asda is still fighting for a superstore in Stoke.
